country.country_description: Tothemi is a small, mountainous country located on a distant planet. It is known for its picturesque landscapes and friendly people.
country.people_description: The people of Tothemi are friendly and kind, always willing to lend a helping hand. They are also known for their love of music and storytelling.
country.language_description: Tothemian is a spoken language which is based on sounds resembling birdsong. It is quite distinct from languages spoken on Earth.
